mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, name, password, ci, tel, email, join_date, point, rental_date, profile_image, updated_at, role) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{ci}, #{tel}, #{email}, DEFAULT, #{point}, #{rentalDate}, #{profileImage}, DEFAULT, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT *, USER.id AS user_id, SNS_INFO.id AS sns_id FROM user USER LEFT OUTER JOIN sns_info SNS_INFO ON USER.id = SNS_INFO.user_id WHERE USER.ci = #{ci}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns_info (id, user_id, name) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name})

INSERT INTO review (id, title, content, uploaded_at, `like`, status, updated_at, tag, user_id, book_isbn) VALUES (NULL, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, 0, '공개', DEFAULT, #{tag}, #{userId}, (SELECT isbn FROM book WHERE title = #{bookTitle}))
